name: Plushed Away
description:
Overview

 Help Gomi fight and survive the wave of enemies like rats, bats and who knows what in search for the key which helps you unlock the main gate inside a closed shopping mall to escape and get back to its kid.

Goals

Fighting enemies and finding the key to exit the mall.

Pillars
  • Combat
  • Story
  • Aesthetics
3Cs
  • Character
    You play as the lost cat plushy, Gomi who beats up anyone who gets in their way.
  • Camera
    Classic beat'em up Front view 2D- Side scroller
  • Controls
    Standard keyboard Controls which include WASD and Arrow Keys for Movement and Spacebar for attacks and combos
